icontrol

Class IcontrolAppMockup

  • java.lang.Object
    • icontrol.IcontrolAppMockup

  • public class IcontrolAppMockup
extends java.lang.Object
    Mockup for the test environment. Instantiate this class and it's constructor initializes the MockupView as well as the Dispatcher. All classes of the iC-framework should now be able to run.

    It would be nicer if this class were in the test/ directory, but becuase the Utilities.getView needs access IcontrolAppMockup.getView, it needs to be in the source directory, where it also gets distributed, but well.

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    KPP (Kurt Pernstich: pernstich@alumni.ethz.ch)

    • Constructor Detail

      • IcontrolAppMockup

        public IcontrolAppMockup()
        Constructor. Enables No-Communication-Mode and enables Syntax-Check Mode. Sets up the Loggers to write to a file in the standard $user home$/iC/iC log directory with Log level of ALL. If the directory does not exist, run the program once, as this ask to create the directory for you.

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public static GUI_Interface getView()
        Returns:
        Returns the GUI_Interface (aka, the GUI) when iC is run as a Unit Test and not as a "regular" application.

      • setSimulationMode

        public final void setSimulationMode(boolean SimulationMode)
        Sets the global Simulation Mode during Tests.
        Parameters:
        SimulationMode - When true, the global Simulation Mode is enabled.
